PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15202017-12-08,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Deduction for Provincial Rebate (GST/HST) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the DEDUCTION FOR PROVINCIAL REBATE (GST/HST) REGULATIONS in order to amend existing GST/HST regulations made under the Excise Tax Act to formalize and give legal effect to the decision of Newfoundland and Labrador to reinstate the provincial point-of-sale rebate of the Newfoundland and Labrador component of the HST for books.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0274 Publication Date: 2017-12-27
AttachmentsAttachment
